name: Heat Guardian
description: Heat Guardian is a hardcore top-down shooter set in a freezing world. You’ll have to travel through the dying lands to find the one last stronghold of humanity – trying your best to stay alive. Deadly mutants, limited resources and even the world itself make this journey a trial only the most skilled survivors can endure.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.8Ghz or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 8800GT / ATI Radeon HD 4850 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 64-bit Processor: Intel i3 Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 Storage: 500 MB available space
